AttributeDefinition.name: ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: A unique identifier for the user resource in Oracle Applications Cloud

AttributeDefinition.name: Display Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The display name of the user, usually the full name

AttributeDefinition.name: Email
AttributeDefinition.Description: The primary e-mail address of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: User Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: A unique identifier for the user to authenticate with the service provider directly

AttributeDefinition.name: Status
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates the administrative status of the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: First Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The first name of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: Last Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The last name of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: Last Modified Date
AttributeDefinition.Description: The last modified date of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: Created Date
AttributeDefinition.Description: The created date of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: User Category
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user category of the user. By default, the value is DEFAULT

AttributeDefinition.name: Account Type
AttributeDefinition.Description: The account type of a user to indicate person or party association

AttributeDefinition.name: Manager
AttributeDefinition.Description: The manager associated to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: Person Number
AttributeDefinition.Description: The worker ID or person number associated to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: Business Unit
AttributeDefinition.Description: The business unit to which the user belongs

AttributeDefinition.name: Department
AttributeDefinition.Description: The department to which the user belongs

AttributeDefinition.name: Job
AttributeDefinition.Description: The job title of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: Roles
AttributeDefinition.Description: The list of roles assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: Data Access
AttributeDefinition.Description: Combination of role, security context and its values assigned to the user

AttributeDefinition.name: ID
AttributeDefinition.Description: A unique identifier for the role resource in Oracle Applications Cloud

AttributeDefinition.name: Description
AttributeDefinition.Description: Description of the role

AttributeDefinition.name: Category
AttributeDefinition.Description: The category of role

AttributeDefinition.name: Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: A unique identifier for the role to authenticate with the service provider directly

AttributeDefinition.name: Last Modified Date
AttributeDefinition.Description: The last modified date of the role

AttributeDefinition.name: Created Date
AttributeDefinition.Description: The created date of the role

AttributeDefinition.name: Display Name
AttributeDefinition.Description: The display name of the role
